title.rendered: Monthly Update: July Report – Desktop and Mobile Updates.

content.rendered:
Here are the happenings and the info about Atomic from July. Read it up to know more about the desktop and mobile updates, AWC story on BNB mainnet, AWC staking, newly supported DeFi coins, and, as a bonus, the guide on DeFi.


Desktop Release (2.18.2)

The new desktop version 2.18.2 has these features:

  • New ERC20 token: Compound (COMP).
  • Buy QTUM, ICX with a credit card and earn cash back rewards.
  • New Basic Membership level now starts at 300 AWC.
  • History improved and speeded up.
  • Fixes for KMD, BCD, ONT/ONG, ZEC sending, bep2 tokens.

You can download Atomic here.


Mobile Release (0.62.2)

The new mobile version 0.62.2 has these features:

  • Buy AWC from Binance DEX for BNB in the wallet!
  • Airdrop local restrictions added.
  • Transactions are instantly uploaded in the history tab after sending.
  • Added support for Compound (COMP) ERC-20 token.
  • Buy QTUM, ICX with a creadit card added.
  • Bug fixes for ADA, KMD, BCD, ONT/ONG, bep2 tokens.

You can download Atomic here.


AWC Staking

Atomic Wallet Token (AWC) staking has been out for 10 weeks, and it’s on fire! There are 5627 holders who stake and get the rewards from a minimum of 10 AWC deposit with a maximum 23% yearly profit. 13,942 AWC worth of $21,000 rewards were paid last week! Try it with a mobile app or a desktop version.

Stake AWC and earn up to 23%.


AWC on Binance Chain

Atomic Wallet Token (AWC) is one of the most popular utility tokens on Binance DEX. We have over 70,000 holders, who stake AWC, earn weekly rewards, get cash back, participate in the affiliate and the voting programs. Read the story on how we’ve built AWC on Binance mainnet!


Support Work in July

In July, our support team reacted to 11,327 issues in 57 minutes on average. We’re constantly getting reviews on the service, and happily improving it day by day. In case of any problem, reach us by email or live chat widget on our website. Atomic support service works for you 24/7. 


DeFi: Atomic Wallet Guide

Decentralized Finance continues to be one of the hottest topics in the crypto space. Why is it so? What is DeFi? Find out in our complete guide.
